short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimalist replacement for Chrome's New Tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces Chrome's New Tab page with a minimalist version which shows a blank white page and an imitation of the Bookmarks Bar. To recover the default New Tab page, simply remove the extension.
